FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS: PAYMENTS

Cash on Delivery

Cash on Delivery (COD) is an exclusive service we provide to our customers for certain postal codes. It's a risk-free payment method where you only pay upon receiving your goods.

Pro-tip: choosing COD also allows your order to be processed faster since we won't be needing to do any bank or credit card checks.

Please note that you need to pay the COD amount to our delivery partner before opening your parcel and trying on your items. This is for security and anonymity purposes. If you don't like the products or the size doesn't fit you, you can always return the items afterward.

Credit Card / Debit Card

We accept locally and internationally issued Mastercard, VISA, or JCB credit or debit cards for payments and ensure the proper measures to keep your account details safe. If you're a first-time customer paying via credit card, remember that we'll get in touch via call to verify. This is to guard against fraud buyers.

STOPSHOP Wallet

Pay securely, seamlessly, and enjoy hassle-free shopping through the use of STOPSHOP Wallet, our cashless payment method.

GCash

GCash is an online mobile wallet solution linked to your mobile number that enables you to purchase items online. By simply choosing it as a preferred option in the Select Payment Method page. First time users will be redirected to the GCash Login page and be given an authentication code to login.

Installments

  • A. BDO Installments
    • BDO Credit Card offers 3-month, 6-month, 9-month, 12-month, 18-month, 24-month, and 36-month payment installments to all BDO credit card holders. To pay for your purchase via BDO Credit Card Installment, select BDO Installment as your preferred option upon checkout. Please note that the minimum purchase of BDO Installment is a minimum of PHP 3,000.
  • B. Non-Credit cardholder installment plans
    • STOPSHOP also offers installment plans for Non-Credit Card Holders through Billease, InvestEd, Paylater, TendoPay, Cashalo, UnaPlay, Plentina, Flexi Finance.
